Title: Karen Peralta
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Alison Agosti, Gabe Liedman, Phil Augusta Jackson (executive story editor), Tricia McAlpin (executive story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: On Jake's birthday, his Mom tells him she is back together with his hated father. Meanwhile, Charles has an embarrassing moment with a body cam, and Holt's "Escape the Room" exercise for the Nine-Nine does not go as planned.
